title: Restoration dream, Antique house - LIP 124
details: LIP-124 A magnificent antique house built over 100 years ago located 5km from Koggala beach. This solid well-built house has loads of character inside and out and is looking for some tlc to bring it back to its former glory. The house consists of 5 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, kitchen, and living areas with an inner courtyard to the rear of the house. The structure is solid, the rooms are well proportioned, and it is perfectly positioned on 240 perches of land overlooking the paddy fields. The property has a very good access road and is only 15 minutes’ drive to the beach and 35 minutes from Galle Fort.
